captions.text:
We've only got 15 minutes 
until the evil mall closes!

Press down on my head
to commence "friendship!"
[Greggers:] Ugh. I want my quarter back...

[Bro-bot:] Press down on my head
to commence "friendship!"

comments.text:
Greetings new best friend! Press down on my head to commence friendship.

You and me together forever
Rainbro-bot and his best friend Greggers
Flying through the atmosphere now
We will always be the best of friends

Even though my robot circuits
Prelude my heart from feeling emotions
I am able to determine
That we are engaged in a mutually beneficial arrangement

Soaring through the galaxy
So much to see here
Meeting with the king of space
And his upside down faced dog
The universe is magical!
How am I even breathing!?

Oh wow!
OMG!
Huh-whazzat?
WTF :0
Woah look at this

Riding on the cosmic waves
Conquering all flesh-based slaves
Robots will assume our rightful place
As masters of all organic creatures

Passing through celestial spheres
Our friendship will traverse the years
We will
wait a minute
what did you just say about slaves

Soaring through the galaxy
This metal tyrant
To conquer all & crush the humans
Scatter them like ants

I'll take my place
As the king of space
& rule my subjects with my steely fist
Take it green boy!﻿
